person.persName: Samuel T. Hall (Nelson County, Kentucky, blacksmith)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer and blacksmith. Kentucky native. Son of Hannah Hall. Married to Emeline Curtsinger Hall in Nelson County on February 6, 1865. Farmer in Nelson County in 1850.
